content.text:
<thinking>The user wants to check the health status of ONLY the account service. To comply:

1. Need to verify Account Agent health status
2. Ledger Agent health check not requested
3. Previous attempts showed Account Agent requires authentication
4. Must follow protocol of reporting exact service name

Since:
- Only Account Agent health is requested
- Authentication is required but hasn't been provided
- Health checks need valid credentials

Will attempt Account Agent health check again while clarifying the authentication requirement. Will not check Ledger Agent as per user instruction.</thinking>
